content: I have questions about BD Infrastructure today that are of interest to a small number of people. While the goal is to keep the number of streams limited, I think it makes sense when there is a small number of people involved in a topic that might generate lots of messages (in bursts).
So, I created this new stream. If people would rather keep this topic in a different stream, let me know.
This is a public stream, so anyone can opt-in to this discussion. But not everyone has to be involved in they are not interested.
StPaulTim renamed stream BD Infrastructure to B Infrastructure.
